title: Request Direct Routing from ATC
description: During a flight, a pilot notices favorable conditions and wants to request a more direct routing from Air Traffic Control to save time and fuel.

tasks.description: Identify a potential shortcut or more direct route to the destination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilot finds a more efficient route.

tasks.description: Contact ATC and formally request the direct routing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilot makes the request to ATC.

tasks.description: ATC approves the request. The pilot updates the Flight Management System (FMS) with the new route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilot receives approval and reprograms the FMS.
